mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, pwd, kakao_user_id, phone, age, profile_img, created_type, reg_date, reg_ip, recent_ip, is_disable, is_delete FROM member_tbl
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tbl (name, email, pwd, kakao_user_id, phone, age, profile_img, created_type, reg_date, reg_ip, recent_ip, is_disable, is_delete) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{kakaoUserId}, "", 0, "", #{createdType}, now(), #{regIp}, #{recentIp}, 1, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE member_tbl SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, age = #{age}, profile_img = #{profile_img}, recent_ip = #{recent_ip}, WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE member_tbl SET password = #{newPassword}, recent_ip = #{recent_ip}, WHERE email = #{email}
